search_results.snippet:
HISTORIC LEADERS' LETTERS TO SANTA: "...& one last thing. If a Spaniard 
ever topples my rule as the 9th Aztec emperor, I'd like but one thing...revenge!".
search_results.title: Jeopary Questions page 206 - COOKING - TriviaBistro.com

question: "...& one last thing.  If a Spaniard ever topples my rule as the 9th Aztec emperor, I'd like but one thing...revenge!"
